title: 'Letters Of Note' Finds Lessons In Candid Correspondence
teaser: For a week-long series on letter writing, Audie Cornish speaks to Shaun Usher, author of Letters of Note: An Eclectic Collection of Correspondence Deserving of a Wider Audience.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
